SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT S.SLRY, S.STNDR_YEAR_MONTH AS STNDR_YM, E.EMP_NAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN APNTM A ON E.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN RANK R ON A.RANK_NUM = R.RANK_NUM INNER JOIN DEPT D ON A.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM INNER JOIN SLRY S ON E.EMP_NUM = S.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN BNFT B ON E.EMP_NUM = B.EMP_NUM AND S.STNDR_YEAR_MONTH = B.STNDR_YEAR_MONTH GROUP BY D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, S.SLRY, S.STNDR_YEAR_MONTH ) WHERE TO_CHAR(STNDR_YM, 'YYYY-MM') = #{mon}
AND EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
